data.text: 10 Mhulichize malanguso ga heni, hemwe wanhu wa heni,
Ndogabula mlomo wa heni kwa nhelo,
mbuli zotuzihuliche na kuzizela,
Hatuwavisa wana wa hetwe,
Nakawapa walelwa wa Yakobo malajizo,
leka wanhu wa lulelo lulinguya,
Wamuwichile Nguluwi kitumbila kwa hewo,
Waleche kuwa kota wasekulu wa hewo,
Wanhu wa Efulaimu, mipinde na misale mmoko,
Hawalibatilile ilagano lya Nguluwi,
Nawasemwa mbuli zoyawele yaziditile,
Nakadita vinduzanduza hali wasekulu wa hewo,
Nakaigawanula bahali na kuwadita waloche amo,
Nemisi nakawalongoza kwa ng'hungugu,
Nakatula mitalawe ako kugunuche,
Nakadita vikolola vilavye mazi kulawa kuli italawe,
Ila nawalutilila kumditila gehile Nguluwi,
Nawamjeza Nguluwi kwa kunuwila,
Nawamkovula Nguluwi wolonga,
Kwa kukomya, nakatowa italawe,
Mkulu Nguluwi naloyahuliche ago, nayali yamemile kuzudila,
kwa vila hawamkundile Nguluwi,
Ila nakalajiza ng'hungugu ya kuchanya,
nakawadulisila mana leka walye,
Wanhu nawalya chilyo cha wahilisi,
Nakegala mbeho ya kolilawilaga isanya kulawa kilanga,
nakawagalila wanhu wa heye miwunde kota nhimbwisi,
Videje avyo navigwa hali kambi ya hewo,
Wanhu nawalya na kiguta ng'hatu,
Ila lowawele wang'hali kigutiza maya ga hewo,
ng'halazi ya Nguluwi naiwafika hewo,
Ila nawalutilila kudita gehile hali Nguluwi,
Lelo, nakaduma mazuwa ga hewo kota lweselo,
Chila loyawakopole, wala waponile nawampala,
Nawakumbuchila kota Nguluwi nayali italawe lya hewo,
Ila nawamhada kwa ulonzi wa hewo,
Hawambatilile heye kwa nhumbula,
Ila Nguluwi yawele na isungu nakaugubika wihe wa hewo,
Nakakumbuchila kota hewo ndo wanhu hela,
Mala zilinga nawambelenhuka kuchiwala,
Nawamjeza Nguluwi chila mhela,
Hawalukumbuchile ludali lwa heye,
naloyaditile mbuli za kububuwaza kuli isi ya Misili,
Nakagalusa zila nzanda ziwa danda,
Nakawahilichila vilundo vya ng'onzi ziwele naziwatunya,
Nakalajiza nzije, nazilya mbena za hewo,
Nakajiwifya mizabibu ja hewo kwa nhonya ya maganga,
Misenga ja hewo najikopoligwa kwa nhonya ya maganga,
Nakaleka ng'halazi ya heye iwafiche,
Nakalechelela ng'halazi ya heye ilutilile,
Nakawakopola walelwa wa mwaluko weng'ha wa Misili,
Hamba nakawahilika wanhu wa heye kota ming'holo,
Nakawalongoza goya, nawo hawadumbile,
Nakawegala kuli isi ya heye yelile,
Nakawawinga wanhu wa isi hali hewo,
Ila nawamjeza na kumbelenhuka Nguluwi Yawele Kuchanya,
Ila nawahinduka na kudita gehile kota wasekulu wa hewo,
Nawamzudiza kwa honhu hawo ha kulavila nhambiko ha milungu,
Nguluwi loyagawene ago, nakazudila,
Nakalileka ihema lyelile lya heye ako Shilo,
Nakalileka isanduku, ulajilo wa mong'ho wa heye, liholigwe kuli isi ya chijenzi,
Nakawazudila wanhu wa heye yuye,
Chiluli nachiwalakaza wasongolo wa hewo,
Watambika wa hewo nawabagama kwa ipanga,
Hamba Mkulu nakalilimka kota munhu yolawa kuli usinjizi,
Nakawawinga wang'honyo wa heye,
Nakailema nhanzi ya Yusufu,
ila nakaihagula nhanzi ya Yuda,
Nakazenga aho ng'handa ya heye ng'hulu kota ulanga,
Nakamhagula Daudi, chitumagwa wa heye,
Nakamlavya kuli mijito ja kudima ming'holo,
Daudi nakawadima kwa nhumbula ya heye yeng'ha,
